name: Swimming 2016
description:
Become an champion swimmer and swim the 100 metres aqua dome! Dive into the deep end and out-swim your opponents to win for your country! Challenge your rivals from across the world to earn your golden medal and take your place on the winners podium.

Stick to your lane and swim as fast as you can. Beat the teams to claim gold and glory!

- Swim 100 metres!
- Take part in the world Championships!
- Swim against team rivals!
- Many levels in the swimming championship!
